titles.title: To prohibit the export of satellites intended for launch from launch vehicles owned by China.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Policy, Trade and Environment.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Security, International Organizations and Human Rights.

committee.name: House Foreign Affairs
committee.subcommittee: International Security, International Organizations, and Human Rights

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Prohibits the issuance of a license under the Arms Export Control Act for the export of satellites intended for launch from a launch vehicle owned by China.
